alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 12:29AM CDT until July 31 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Carver to 6 miles north of Walnut to 4 miles west of Saint Paul, moving south at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Huntsville... Withrow Springs State Park... Carrollton... Rudd... Pettigrew... Japton... Kingston... Witter... Marble... Aurora... Osage... Rule... Boston... Georgetown... Dryfork... Red Star... Metalton... Weathers... Connor... Coin... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
